description: The Health Promotion and Chronic Disease Prevention Branch of the Public Health Agency of Canada (PHAC) is seeking professional services of a Senior Evaluation Services Consultant and a Senior Subject Matter Expert both with expertise to carryout evaluation priorities for the 9-8-8: Suicide Crisis Helpline funding program.
full_summary:
==================

### Senior Evaluation Services Consultant and Senior Subject Matter Expert

**Tender Title:** [English and French]
* [English] Senior Evaluation Services Consultant Level 3 and Senior Subject Matter Expert Level 3 for the 9-8-8 Suicide Crisis Helpline Funding Program
* [French] Expert-conseil principal en services d'évaluation niveau 3 et Spécialiste principal en la matière niveau 3 pour mener à bien les priorités pour le programme de financement du 9-8-8 : Ligne d’aide en cas de suicide

**Reference Number:** cb-829-96088971
**Amendment Number:** 4
**Solicitation Number:** 1000255006
**Publication Date:** 2023-12-21

**Tender Closing Date:** 2024-01-19T14:00:00
**Amendment Date:** 2024-01-19
**Expected Contract Start Date:** 2024-01-31
**Expected Contract End Date:** 2025-03-31
* **Tender Status:** This tender opportunity is expired.

**Solicitation Details:**

* The Public Health Agency of Canada is seeking a Senior Evaluation Services Consultant and a Senior Subject Matter Expert for the 9-8-8 Suicide Crisis Helpline funding program.
* The successful candidate will provide evaluation services and perform short-term projects, with the possibility of achieving stage three.

**Trade Agreements:**

This solicitation is open to firms from countries that have signed Free Trade Agreements (FTAs) with Canada, specifically:

* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* North American Free Trade Agreement (NAFTA)
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)

**More Information:**

To review more details about this solicitation, kindly visit our website at [link provided] and download the tender notice (English and French).
